definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: It is not known whether he has yet been charged.
sentences.chinese: 目前還不知道該男子有沒有被定罪。

sentences.english: Have the hearers been convicted of their sin by the Law?
sentences.chinese: 信衆因着律法已經被定罪了嗎？

sentences.english: Criminalization and discrimination foster new infections each day.
sentences.chinese: 刑事定罪和歧視每天都在促發新的感染。

sentences.english: The Man condemned to die on Calvary.
sentences.chinese: 這個被定罪要被處死在髑髏地的人。

sentences.english: Conviction and sentencing are two basic links in criminal judicial procedure.
sentences.chinese: 定罪與量刑是刑事審判活動的兩個基本環節。

sentences.english: Make this your case: no jury would convict.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你拿這個做辯護詞，陪審團肯定不會定罪的。
我成了一個已定罪的全國重犯。

sentences.english: But the costs of criminalization have proved to be enormous, perhaps unsustainable.
sentences.chinese: 但定罪的費用已被證明是巨大的，也許是不能維持的。

sentences.english: "I predict there will be convictions this time, " says Kass.
sentences.chinese: 我預測這回會給這些人定罪。

sentences.english: Why not wait until the conviction, and then sue?
sentences.chinese: 那爲什麼還要起訴，想給他定罪呢？

sentences.english: This conviction was for crossing another line.
sentences.chinese: 這個定罪是越過其他界線的。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court has ruled that laws criminalizing homosexual conduct are unconstitutional.
sentences.chinese: 最高法院裁定同性戀行爲定罪的法律是違憲的。

sentences.english: And yet this is the face of a  convicted murderer.
sentences.chinese: 這，就是已被定罪爲殺人兇手的面孔。

sentences.english: The evidence unequivocally shows that criminalizing the drug abuser does not solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 有證據明確表明給吸毒者定罪並不能解決問題。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen, who has been expelled from the Communist Party, has yet to go on trial for the charges against him.
sentences.chinese: 陳良玉已被開除黨籍，但還沒有正式定罪服刑。

sentences.english: The jury will not convict on circumstantial evidence alone.
sentences.chinese: 陪審團不會僅僅根據旁證來定罪。

definition: to assess punishment/to determine the sentence (on a criminal)
to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
in custody/to keep sb in detention
